TopicTitle: Helwyr Replica Starships LTD Release I

Articles.Content:
This is a mod I put together out of requests from members of the community at the Dev thread [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122653-Helwyr-Replica-Starships-LTD-%28accepting-Requests%21%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122653-Helwyr-Replica-Starships-LTD-%28accepting-Requests%21%29)

These ships are sci fi and are overpowered on purpose.

This mod needs this mod for the big ships [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65747-1-0-Hangar-Extender-v3-3](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65747-1-0-Hangar-Extender-v3-3)

I would also suggest this for the big ships [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98943](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98943)

Here are some screenshots.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/OlF4L)

Please put all requests and issues in the DEV thread.

The texures are not very good I'm horrible at them ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Here is the download [https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/857/Helwyr%20Replica%20Starships%20LTD](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/857/Helwyr%20Replica%20Starships%20LTD)

I hope you like it

This mod was inspired by StarVision's work his mod is here [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/37908-0-90-SciFi-Shipyards-v2-3](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/37908-0-90-SciFi-Shipyards-v2-3)

Feel free to put screen shots and discussions about the mod in this thread ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Legal Stuff

This mod is issued under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

> Same problem here. I installed hangar extender too but still only the 2 shuttles show up!

Is it in the Game Data folder

It should look like this

Game data:

 :Helwyr Replica Starships LTD:

If it looks like that it should be fine.

also darkdoom says he fixed it later maybe ask him?

> Is it in the Game Data folder
> It should look like this

> Game data:
> 
>  :Helwyr Replica Starships LTD:
> 
> If it looks like that it should be fine.
> 
> also darkdoom says he fixed it later maybe ask him?

Yes thats the right way (Helwyr Replica Starships LTD) make sure you don`t have the 1.1 after the name.

Wow I installed it wrong and I never do that. Thanks again.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-01T03:04:47Z" title="06/01/2015 03:04  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 1, 2015</time> by mcbmaestro**

Hi everyone, I have a similar problem, although I do not see any ship or part, I have checked in every tab, and I am quite confident that I did nothing wrong in the installation.

My gamedata folder does look like:

:Distant Object:

:Helwyr Replica Starships LTD:

:FShangarExtender:

So what could be wrong? I would really love to check the ships out

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-01T08:09:26Z" title="06/01/2015 08:09  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 1, 2015</time> by Fuel**

> 
> Hi everyone, I have a similar problem, although I do not see any ship or part, I have checked in every tab, and I am quite confident that I did nothing wrong in the installation.
> My gamedata folder does look like:
> 
> :Distant Object:
> 
> :Helwyr Replica Starships LTD:
> 
> :FShangarExtender:
> 
> So what could be wrong? I would really love to check the ships out

Is it unzipped?

if it is then try it without the other two and if that works then add one try it then add the other.

The other mods should not effect it in any way but anything is possible.

You are not using x64 right? Because this has not been tested for the rather buggy x64.

It also has not been tested on Mac.

Guys.....

I'm sorry but due to circumstances beyond my control I'm forced to halt development on this mod for a while Sorry.

I dont know when I will be able to pick it up again. maybe in a few weeks or a couple months.

Sorry to let you guys down but it cant be helped. I wanted to see this through but I cant for now.

I will continue to work on models for the suggested ships as often as I can I will try to keep you informed but I wont be very active in the forums for some time. Here is a list of the ships I will try to work on in my spare time.

BSG Viper

Death Star

Star Destroyer

Super Star Destroyer

Slave 1

SSV Normandy

Normandy SR2

Mothership Zeta

For all the people who were looking forward to the Aries 1B I,m sorry. But You should look here[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...-Space-Odyssey](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107803-WIP-Aries-1B-from-2001-A-Space-Odyssey) I'm so Sorry guys Hopefully I can get back to this I enjoyed it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Goodbye** ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Most of you probably saw this coming?

But sorry this is the end ![k_sad.gif](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/smilies/k_sad.gif)

a surplus of real life concerns have emerged and I cant keep up with them.

I dont think I will ever be able to continue the development on this mod ![k_sad.gif](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/smilies/k_sad.gif)

I'm really really sorry I hope you all like the stuff that was done so far.

goodbye ![k_cry.gif](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/smilies/k_cry.gif)
